scripts.testWithCoverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/test/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
scripts.cover2: nyc --reporter html --reporter text npm run test
scripts.cover: nyc --reporter html --reporter text -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/test/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
scripts.travis-cover: nyc --reporter lcovonly -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/test/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
scripts.dist: tsc && cp -p package.json dist && cp -p README.md dist && cd dist && npm publish
